articles.description: Serena Williams and Novak Djokovic were on the official US Open entry lists released Wednesday, but that doesn't mean they'll necessarily play in the tournament -- and in Djokovic's case, he can't, as of now, because he isn't vaccinated against COVID-19.

articles.title: Tyson Fury offers to fight fellow Brit Anthony Joshua for free, on free TV, with free tickets for fans
articles.description: Tyson Fury, who retired in April, says he's willing to step back in the ring and face fellow Brit Anthony Joshua for free, as long as the fight airs on free TV and all tickets to the potential match are free for fans.
articles.content:
Tyson Fury announced his retirement in April, but it doesn't appear the heavyweight champion's hiatus will last long.
